Title: English language selector issue
Description: The 'English' text in the language selector is hardcoded and should be dynamically updated based on the selected language. The globe icon should also be on the left, mirroring the layout.
Suggestion: Use an Arabic equivalent for 'English' when Arabic is selected and switch the icon's position for RTL.

Title: Application Version label placement issue
Description: v1.0.0 is hardcoded and will remain in English. It should be on the right for an RTL layout.

Title: English language toggle alignment issue
Description: The English toggle is aligned to the left. In RTL, it should be on the right.
Suggestion: Move the language toggle to the right side of the screen.

Title: Text alignment issues
Description: The text in the buttons is centered, which is good. However, the padding between the text and the button edges seems slightly inconsistent. In an RTL context, the text should naturally align to the right, and the visual should complement this.
Suggestion: Ensure consistent padding, taking into account RTL alignment conventions.

Title: Luggage icon placement
Description: The luggage icon is on the left. In an RTL context, it should be on the right of the text.
Suggestion: Swap the icon and text positions.

Title: Animation text not translated.
Description: The text Animation" near the top center of the screen is not translated to Arabic."

Title: Animation label placement issue
Description: The 'Animation' label seems too close to the loading indicator, especially in relation to the spacing above the indicator. The word 'animation' should be in Arabic.
Suggestion: Increase the spacing between the loading indicator and the 'Animation' label.
